gov.nasa.worldwind.ogc.collada
Class VBOElementRenderer

java.lang.Object
  gov.nasa.worldwind.ogc.collada.VBOElementRenderer

public class VBOElementRenderer
extends Object

Class used for rendering with UnifiedBuffer objects. This class is not quite ready for public consumption, but getting close. Usage: vboElementRenderer = UnifiedBuffer.GetVBOElementRenderer( dc, GL.GL_TRIANGLES, vertsPerTri * numberOfElements, positionCoordsPerVert, texCoordsPerVert, totalDataSizePerVertexInFloats);

beginDataPush

public FloatBuffer beginDataPush(DrawContext dc)
client code that uses this renderer calls to obtain a buffer to fill with coords to render

Parameters:
dc - the current DrawContext
Returns:
returns a coord buffer to fill with XYZ, etc.

beginDrawing

public void beginDrawing(javax.media.opengl.GL gl)
For batch rendering, this can be called at the beginning of rendering

Parameters:
gl - the current GLContext

binds the VBO's necessary to draw

chunkPurged

public void chunkPurged(gov.nasa.worldwind.ogc.collada.UnifiedBufferStorageChunk unifiedBufferStorageChunk,
                        DrawContext dc)
a call back that gets called by the chunk if the chunk has been purged and we need to clear caches that are now invalid.

Parameters:
unifiedBufferStorageChunk - the chunk that has just been purged.
dc - the current DrawContext

drawWithVBO

public void drawWithVBO(DrawContext dc)
Draws the elements placed in this object with VBOs (by calling glDrawRangeElements) after making sure the proper buffers are bound

Parameters:
dc - the current DrawContext

drawWithVertexArray

public void drawWithVertexArray(javax.media.opengl.GL gl)
Draws the elements placed in this object using Vertex Arrays

Parameters:
gl - the current GLContext

endDataPush_SynchToGPU

public void endDataPush_SynchToGPU(DrawContext dc,
                                   boolean useVBOs)
client code that uses this renderer calls this when its done filling the buffer it obtained from beginDataPush so that we can push the data to the GPU by calling our internal bufferSubData caches that are now invalid.

Parameters:
dc - the current DrawContext
useVBOs - this is so we can in modes where we dont actually make vbos, either for old GPUs or for testing

endDrawing

public void endDrawing(javax.media.opengl.GL gl)
For batch rendering, this can be called at the beginning of rendering

Parameters:
gl - the current GLContext

setupIndexBuffer

public void setupIndexBuffer(DrawContext dc)
sets up the index buffer for the renderer. This involves filling the index buffer with offsets into the chunk buffer so that later glDrawElements or glDrawRangeElements can be called

Parameters:
dc - the current DrawContext

toString

public String toString()
Overrides:
toString in class Object

vboReady

public boolean vboReady(DrawContext dc)
checks to see if the vbo for our index buffer is ready, and then asks the chunk to see if its vbo is ready as well.

Parameters:
dc - the current DrawContext
Returns:
returns true if vbo is ready

ready

public boolean ready()
